title: We care for your comfort so do our apartments
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
Welcome to Midtown Square at 23rd & Union in Seattle
A historic, central Seattle crossroad, 23rd & Union will always be an intersection of life in all of its splendid forms.
From the vibrant artwork to the carefully selected commercial tenants to the residential spaces, Midtown Square was designed for — and by — the Central Area community.

This unique development adds a wide variety of apartment homes (30% of which are designated as affordable units per City of Seattle guidelines), along with new retail space for local, minority-owned businesses, all within a massive, cultural artwork-focused public square for all to enjoy.
Midtown Square offers new opportunities within a space that regards the past with respect, honors the present with dignity, and gives inspiration to the future.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
